mapper.select: select room_no,connect_time, act_code from tb_history where room_no in (select room_no from tb_room_member where user_no = #{userNo}) and act_code in (#{actStartCode}, #{actEndCode}) and month(connect_time) = #{selectMonth} and day(connect_time) = #{selectDay}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_conference(room_no, user_no, con_start, con_end) values (#{roomNo}, #{userNo}, #{conStart}, #{conEnd})
